name: SimpleTodoApp
description: A simple web application that allows users to create, view, edit, and delete tasks in a to-do list. The app includes a minimal backend for storing tasks in memory (or a JSON file) and a responsive frontend for interacting with the list.
features: User can add a new task with a title and optional description
User can mark tasks as completed
Persist tasks between sessions using a simple JSON file storage
RESTful API built with Node.js and Express
Basic error handling and input validation

files.purpose: Project metadata and dependencies for both server and client
Main Express server handling API routes for CRUD operations on tasks
Simple file-based storage for persisting tasks
Entry point for the React application
Root React component containing the to-do list UI
Component for adding and editing tasks
Component representing a single task with edit, complete, and delete actions
Component that renders the list of TaskItem components
HTML shell for the React app
Exclude node_modules and other unnecessary files from version control
Documentation on how to set up, run, and use the to-do list application
